title: Can't post anywhere?
body:
I'm unable to post in any threads I should be able to, despite the fact it's supposed to let me.

Edit: I'm level 5, and it won't even let me comment on this post. Not even sure how I posted here tbh.

Edit2: I also tried changing browsers, and clearing my cookies and cache. Nothing.

Edit 3: ALL FIXED! Someone please lock this thread, ty.

replies.body: Posting so my account will hopefully sync with the correct level (30). Sorry if this post is unnecessary.
I dunno. I just managed to do it. It was just a bug, so it's all fixed now. Someone please lock the thread?
Help & Support has no level requirement!

When posting for the first time, your account needs to sync with the boards.  It looks like your post here has sync'd your account to level 5.  You should be okay to post now, just keep in mind that some regions of the boards have minimum level requirements like 15 or higher to post.  Everything looks okay now!
